mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.name, m.url, m.parent_id as parentId, m.level FROM (SELECT * FROM `user`) AS u INNER JOIN user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.id = 'e3b08d4c-508e-4caf-b2d4-404cade93544' INNER JOIN role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN role_menu AS rm ON rm.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN menu AS m ON rm.menu_id = m.id
